title.narrative: Soutien à la mobilité des chercheurs et à l'organisation d'ateliers
Support to Researcher Mobility and Workshops

description.narrative:
This grant will allow IDRC to offer opportunities to share project results, allow IDRC-funded researchers in the Middle East and North Africa travel to round tables, and highlight program priorities.
The travel grants will create opportunities for speakers, foreign students, and participants to attend the Public Health in Contexts of Uncertainty Conference at the American University in Beirut's Faculty of Health Sciences in December 2014.
The remaining funds will be used for the following activities: - IDRC grantee travel to round tables on entrepreneurship in Agadir, Morocco - IDRC grantee travel to round tables on water and flood management in Dhaka, Bangladesh - travel by a Canadian expert on radarsat imagery to train Egyptians in Cairo - a joint workshop with the Egyptian Center for Economic Studies
Each of these activities represents opportunities that complement existing IDRC projects.
